author: Special Correspondent
title: Madurai City Police sets up control room to help residents during lockdown
description: Orders for essential items can be placed over phone. Goods would be home delivered, says Commissioner of Police.
content:
Madurai City Police have set up a control room to cater to urgent needs of the city residents during the lockdown period.
People can call 0452- 253 1044 or 253 1045 for any type of help, Commissioner of Police, S. Davidson Devasirvatham said that the objecti… [+1557 chars]
